name: df-voln
body: |- wceq(cvoln, cmpt(s0, cfn, cres(cfv(covoln, cv(s0)), cfv(ccaragen, cfv(covoln, cv(s0))))))
comment: Define the Lebesgue measure for the space of multidimensional real numbers. The cardinality of ` x ` is the dimension of the space modeled. Definition 115C of [Fremlin1] p. 30. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
